value:
I've been observing the people
here—they know what they're doing. I
find that reassuring.

My country faces destruction. Nothing
is more important than protecting our
prince.

I fought beside Lord Sigurd until the
very end. I don't regret it for a second.

If you wish to study the sword, I'll
teach you. But if you accept my offer,
don't expect me to hold back.

Flowers? Dresses? No thank you. I
don't have time to waste. If I have
some time, I grab my sword and train.

My name is Ayra. I bring greetings
from $Nf.
I have Od's blood to thank for this!

To study the sword is to walk a
long road. I walk it every day.
I must steady myself.

In Isaach, we repay our debts. I
will repay mine on the battlefield.

I am Princess Ayra of Isaach—a
descendant of the crusader Od.

Before I came here, I fought
alongside my comrades in a great
battle. We were defeated.$k$pThat's just how it is. And even if I
could go back in time... I'd still fight.$k$pYes, I'd fight to the bitter end. I have
no doubt. What's really important is
how you live your life.$k$pBeing here, with you...I can't
complain. I'm satisfied with things as
they are.$k$pBut we might part ways—one day.
Keeping that in mind reminds me how
precious our time together really is.
はぁっ！
やぁっ！
きゃああっ！
ゆ、許さん…
Pitiful.
I won't let you live.
Your life is mine.
Let's see you handle this.
Sorry...
(a sigh)
You need something? No? All right, then.
Huh? Do that again, and you'll pull back a stump.
If you're trying to give me a gift, save it. You should find a girl who cares about such things.
Thanks to your strategy, I'm still here. I just wanted to let you know that I'm grateful.
Ladylike? Me? You've got to be joking.
There's no way I'm dying before the Kingdom of Isaach is restored.
In Isaach, we repay our debts. My sword arm is yours.
Got it.
You have my word.
Orders?
